item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1290; 06:08PM; 2800 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XYdDRG; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: Over 100 firefighters extinguished the blaze in 53 minutes. There are still small pockets of fire they are working to access and extinguish. There are approximately 8 residential units on the 2nd floor. One LAFD fire engine was on scene (prior to the fire) in support of a LAPD operation at this building. When smoke became visible from a window, the fire officer upgraded it to a structure fire response. LAPD evacuated the building for their operation (prior to the fire) and firefighters are conducting a thorough search to ensure no occupants remained. A 45yo M was transported with non-life threatening injuries and is in LAPD custody. The possible involvement of this patient with the fire is under investigation and no further information is available at this time. LAFD PIO Captain Cecco Secci is on scene for media availability. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E2 E20 E201 E209 E210 E211 E220 E226 E227 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E3 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA20 RA29 RA3 RA803 RA811 RA827 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T20 T26 T27 T29 T35 UR27 UR88; CH9; 15 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1290; 05:28PM; 2800 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XYdDRG; Westlake; There is now heavy fire involvement in both the 2nd floor and attic. This is an occupied center-hall apartment building and has been evacuated. No injuries reported. Additional resources are enroute. This will be an extended duration incident and commuters are advised to avoid the 7th St x Hoover St area. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E20 E211 E220 E226 E227 E229 E26 E27 E29 E3 E6 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA20 RA29 RA3 RA827 T11 T20 T26 T27 T29 UR27 UR88; CH9; 15 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1290; 05:15PM; 2800 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XYdDRG; Westlake; Two story, center-hall apartment building with fire showing from the 2nd floor. Additional resources requested.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 CM22 E11 E211 E229 E26 E3 E6 RA20 RA29 T11 T29; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Explosion; INC#1164; 05:11PM; 923 Bloom Wk; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wzKrou; University Park; LAFD Hazardous Materials Squad made entry and checked every floor in the building. They found no hazards and confirmed there were no leaks. All air readings (via handheld gas meter) were normal. Only the initial patient (as per first alert) was transported, there were no other injuries reported. Most LAFD resources will be released while one task force remains to oversee the re-population of the building. Any further questions regarding the incident are referred to USC Department of Public Safety. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 CM20 CM22 E10 E13 E15 E21 E210 E215 E221 E226 E46 JT1 JT2 JT3 RA15 RA21 RA46 RA815 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T26; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Explosion; INC#1164; 04:00PM; 923 Bloom Wk; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wzKrou; University Park; An explosion (size ?) occurred in a Science (three story) building on the USC campus. One patient (age/gender/affiliation unknown at this time) is being evaluated for injuries - they evacuated the building and met the LAFD outside on their own. The involved products or process have not been identified. The building is being evacuated and the LAFD HazMat task force is being requested for a thorough investigation. There is NO active fire hazard. ; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E13 E15 E210 E215 E46 RA15 RA46 RA815 SQ21 T10 T15; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0245; 05:35AM; 9613 S Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DjB1B8; #GramercyPark; Firefighters arrived to find a detached garage being consumed by flames. Firefighters quickly extinguished what was left of the detached structure and protected the nearby buildings being exposed to intense heat. Ultimately, it took 18 firefighters 17 minutes (5:52am) to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E57 E64 RA257 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1823; 11:21PM; 13949 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kfQAzh; #ShermanOaks; It took 20 firefighters 14 minutes to extinguish the flames in the 3-story commercial building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E239 E278 E288 E88 E99 RA78 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
